title: Treasure Magnet
info: The Treasure Magnet is an accessory that pulls items in a 9.5 tile square toward the player and can be found in Shadow Chests, as well as the Obsidian Lock Box from Obsidian Crates and Hellstone Crates.
stat:
Type
Accessory
TooltipIncreases pickup range for items
Rarity01*
Sell5
Research1 required
